data.name: Adept Movements
data.description: Improved Stance abilities now cost 35% less AP.

data.name: Aethyric Grasp
data.description: Roots up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of you, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Root has a 50% chance to break whenever hit.

data.name: Balanced Accuracy
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% for 5s after using a Perfect Balance ability.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to elemental resistance.

data.name: Bladeshield
data.description: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for 600 damage and absorb up to 3600 damage for up to 10 seconds.

data.name: Blurring Shock
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: A powerful slash that deals X spirit damage. If the target is afflicted with Heaven's Blade, the target will be hexed and take additional Y spirit damage when Heaven's Blade procs scaling with weapon skill.

data.name: Bolstering Enchantments
data.description: When blade enchants trigger they will now restore X health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Calming Winds
data.description: Increase disrupt chance by 15% for 5s after using a Perfect Balance ability.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Crashing Wave
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of X spirit damage and knocking your opponent down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Crushing Advance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Shield
data.description: A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts X physical damage to all enemies within 25ft in front of you. Additionally, for the next 20 seconds, your block rate is increased by 5% and you gain a X unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Dazzling Strike
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: When your blade hits your opponent it releases a blinding flash of light that deals X spirit damage, and disorients your target for 5 seconds, increasing their build times by 50%.

data.name: Deep Incision
data.description: Quick Incision will now inflict an additional X physical damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that causes target to take a 1056 morale penalty to armor and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Dragon's Talon
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release two rending blows that deal X spirit damage each, crippling your target for 5 seconds, reducing the damage they deal with every attack to 80%.

data.name: Eagle's Flight
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A guarded strike that deals X physical damage and improves your chance to parry by 25% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Ensorcelled Agony
data.description: Ensorcelled Blow will now cause an additional X spirit damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Ensorcelled Blow
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A quick precision slash that calls out the enchantment in your blade dealing X spirit damage.

data.name: Ether Dance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 13 points in Path of Khaine
data.description: You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to five times and dealing X spirit damage with each hit.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Graceful Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A swift attack that deals X physical damage over 5 seconds. Monsters struck with this technique will hate you more.

data.name: Great Weapon Mastery
data.description: When you are wielding a greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Gryphon's Lash
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A fierce attack that deals X physical damage and cannot be blocked or parried.

data.name: Guard
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

data.name: Guard of Steel
data.description: Group members within 100 feet gain a 120 morale bonus to toughness for 10 seconds.

data.name: Gusting Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that which deals X spirit damage to all opponents within 30 feet of you, knocking back enemy players and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Heaven's Blade
data.note: You may have one Blade Enchantment active.
data.description: You enchant your blade with the spirit of the heavens. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance that your target will be hexed for 10s. Whenever they take critical damage, they will also be hit for X spirit damage.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Impeccable Reactions
data.description: Each time you parry an attack, you will also parry the next attack. This double parry can not occur more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Intimidating Blow
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: An overpowering strike that deals X physical damage and decreases your opponent's morale by 100.

data.name: Isha's Protection
data.description: Heals are 20% more effective on you.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Lingering Intimidation
data.description: Intimidating Blow will now reduce your target's chance to critically hit by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Nature's Blade
data.note: You may have one Blade Enchantment active.
data.description: You enchant your blade with the spirit of nature. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal (3 * rank) ability penalty of one stat except wounds from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

data.name: Perfect Defenses
data.description: Increase block and parry chances by 8% for 5s after using a Perfect Balance ability.

data.name: Phantom's Blade
data.note: You may have one Blade Enchantment active.
data.description: You enchant your blade with the spirits of the dead. All your melee attacks have a 25% chance to cause group members to absorb X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Phoenix's Wing
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A broad slash dealing X spirit damage that hits all opponents in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Poised Attacks
data.description: You will gain 30 action points whenever a blade enchant triggers. This effect cannot happen more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Potent Enchantments
data.description: Blade enchantments will also deal X spiritual damage over 9 seconds whenever they trigger. This effect scales with weapon skill.

data.name: Protection of Vaul
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: You call upon the magic in your blade to form a barrier to protect you and any groupmates within 50 feet of you, absorbing up to X damage for up to 5 seconds

data.name: Quick Incision
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: A rapid slash to your opponents legs that deals X physical damage and snares them by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Redirected Force
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: For the next 5s, target takes damage equal to X% of all damage you take.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness.

data.name: Sapping Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A targeted strike that saps the energy from your target dealing X physical damage and reducing your opponent's AP by 10 every second for 5 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Blades
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet suffer 1800 damage over 12 seconds, and will steadily lose 28 morale.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one enchantment from your enemy and do X physical damage.

data.name: Shield of Valor
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Everyone in your group regains 200 action points and is protected by a magical barrier for 10 seconds which will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Sudden Shift
data.description:
With a graceful sweep, you quickly change your stance and prepare for battle.

No Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
Improved Balance: You gain Perfect Balance.
Perfect Balance: You gain Improved Balance.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Throw
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage. Has a chance to deal Y physical damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Vaul's Buffer
data.description: On a successful block, parry, dodge or disrupt you will absorb up to 600 damage over the next 10 seconds. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Wall of Darting Steel
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Increasing your chance to dodge, disrupt and parry attacks by 50% and whenever you defend against attack you will reflect back X spirit damage.

data.name: Whirling Geyser
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: A spinning attack that inflicts 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then knocks them away.

data.name: Whispering Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You release two swift blows that deal X spirit damage each to all enemies within 20 feet. The winds then aid group members within 100 feet for the next 10 seconds by decreasing the cooldown of abilities used by 5 seconds.

data.name: Wings of Heaven
data.description: You magically leap through the air towards your target. When you land, all enemies around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Wrath of Hoeth
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: The magic from your blade is released in a staggering explosion that deals X spiritual damage to all opponents within 30 feet. In addition your targets take a X ability penalty to spirit resistance for 20 seconds.

data.name: Diverse Footing
data.description: Increases the durations of Graceful Strike, Eagle's Flight, and Dragon's Talons by 5 seconds.

data.name: Hoeth's Tempering
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: An enchantment which calls upon the power of Hoeth, rendering your target silenced, unable to use magic for 4 seconds. Target will take X spirit damage at the end of this effect.

data.name: Blinding Strike
data.description: Dazzling Strike will now reduce the target's chance to defend attacks by 10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Aethyric Dissipation
data.description: Dazzling strike will now deal its damage to enemies within 20 feet of the target.
